item.description:
Taking It To The Streets !

How To Find Deals In Today's Market

With Richard Dale-Mesaros, full time investor

Having completed over 60 transactions to date, Richard has developed a no-nonsense approach to digging up deals and he'll be covering:


  • Using Bird Dogs/wholesalers
  • Buying at auctions - what's working now?
  • Finding pre-foreclosures
  • How to handle REO Realtors
  • Paying attention while out and about - recognizing the tell-tale signs for opportunity
  • ...and several other deal sources.


      PLUS: Special segments on what it really takes to be an investor, how to be more efficient each time you leave your driveway and why you should systemize your deal-sourcing activities to keep the pipeline full.

      Your ability to find deals is critical to your bottom line - don't be caught short! Bring your notebook and get ready for a very insightful presentation.
item.name: The New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
